entry.title: More than a Rackmount Case for a Mac

link.title: More than a Rackmount Case for a Mac

entry.summary: I debated buying a new Mac due to its limited options for expandability. This all changed when I found a way to not only rackmount my Mac, but add PCIe slots to add additional components like NVMe SSDs, video capture cards, dual 10 gig networking, and even testing a video card.
